meteringmethod: Matrix, Centre-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), Spot (digital zoom 2X or more)
lens: NIKKOR glass lens, 6 elements in 5 groups, 4.1-12.3mm (35mm equivalent: 30-90mm), f/3.3-5.9
connectivity: Audio/video (A/V) output, Digital I/O (USB) , HDMI micro connector D
flashmodes: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
exposuremodes: Programmed auto exposure; Exposure compensation (-2.0 to +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
shutter: Mechanical and CMOS electronic shutter: 1sec. - 1/2000 sec.
